# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="38c44-102">Aggiungere emoji o gif in Outlook sul Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38c44-102">Add emojis or GIFs in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="38c44-103">Rispondere a un messaggio di posta elettronica esistente o selezionarne uno **nuovo**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38c44-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="38c44-104">Seleziona la faccina sorridente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38c44-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="38c44-105">nella parte inferiore della finestra di composizione per aprire il riquadro espressioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38c44-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="38c44-106">Cerca e scegli il emoji o il GIF che vuoi inserire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38c44-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="38c44-107">Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [personalizzare il messaggio di posta elettronica in Outlook sul Web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38c44-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
